summary: Health app with AI body analysis feature for body type classification
architectural_notes: Uses multimodal vision AI for image analysis
Body type classification system: ectomorph, mesomorph, endomorph
Bottom navigation bar includes: Body Analysis, Fitness Metrics, Lifestyle Survey
Body fat percentage displayed as numerical percentage alongside body type classification

existing_features.title: Create a new Body Analysis page at route '/body-analysis' that allows users to upload a single image for analysis
Display the body type classification result on the frontend with clear visual presentation of the identified type and its characteristics
Add body fat percentage estimation to the body analysis result display, shown alongside the existing body type classification as a numerical percentage value (e.g., '18%')
Remove the Body Analysis navigation link from the Header component's top menu
Create a bottom navigation bar component that displays three menu items: Body Analysis, Fitness Metrics, and Lifestyle Survey
Integrate the bottom navigation bar component into the Layout component so it appears consistently across all pages

Display the muscle mass estimation result on the Body Analysis page (frontend/src/pages/BodyAnalysisPage.tsx) alongside the existing body type classification and body fat percentage, shown as a numerical value with appropriate units (e.g., '45.2 kg' or '42%')

Update the Muscle Mass estimation value text color in the Body Analysis results display (frontend/src/pages/BodyAnalysisPage.tsx) to match the styling used for the Body Fat % and Confidence values, ensuring consistent and readable text color across all result metrics

new_feature_requests.summary: AI body analysis page with image upload and body type classification (ectomorph/mesomorph/endomorph)
Implement AI-powered body type classification that analyzes uploaded images and determines whether the body type is ectomorph, mesomorph, or endomorph
Add body fat percentage estimation alongside body type classification
Remove Body Analysis from top menu and add bottom navigation bar with Body Analysis, Fitness Metrics, and Lifestyle Survey

Add muscle mass estimation to the backend body analysis logic in backend/main.mo, calculating muscle mass as a numerical value (e.g., kilograms or percentage) based on the uploaded body image analysis
